name: Avoid Programs/Includes with too many Forms
description: Programs / includes with too many forms are difficult to maintain. This report shows all the ABAP programs and Includes defining more than X forms. X is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report shows all Abap Programs and Abap Includes having too many Forms.
It provides the following information:
Abap Program/Includes fullname, number of Forms
rationale: High number of Forms decreases the understanding of the program logic. Thus, maintenance will become difficult.
remediation: Check if some Forms are similar and try to factorize them.
total: Number of Abap Programs and Abap Includes
